General.Name: Yantai Zhenghai Magnetic Mat
General.Description: Yantai Zhenghai Magnetic Material Co., Ltd. manufactures and markets neodymium-iron-boron permanent magnets in the People's Republic of China. It exports its products to Germany, South Korea, etc. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Yantai, the People's Republic of China.

4.Name: Mr. Kan  Song
4.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
